summary: Checkpoint Turn: Diagnosed 4x duplicate response issue as API timeouts/errors caused by large context (121K). Implemented Lean Memory Protocol (Checkpointing). Updated AGENTS.md, HEARTBEAT.md, and added End-of-Day cron. Successfully cleared legacy logs.

Comprehensive Recap: Transitioned from legacy per-turn logging to Lean Memory Protocol. Diagnosed 4x response bug as API timeouts on 121K context. Rebuilt AGENTS.md/HEARTBEAT.md. Hardened DB with WAL mode. Updated identity to Natural Assistant (objective/direct). Verified End-of-Day cron active.

Turn Recap: Clarified the distinction between natural memory and forensic reconstruction. Confirmed that the appearance of continuity is due to successful 're-learning' via sessions_history and subsequent checkpointing. System is stable and lean.

Finalized Lean Memory Protocol: Resolved 4x response bug by decoupling logging from live turns. Implemented Checkpoint-based CLM with scripts/checkpoint.py and updated recall_context.py. Hardened SQLite with WAL/timeouts. Formalized 'Natural Assistant' persona and pushback directive. End-of-Day cron job active at 23:50 UTC.

Heartbeat Checkpoint: Reviewed active tasks #38-40 (Paused). Monitored token usage (Uncached: 217k). Completed full refactor of AGENTS.md (v1.2) to remove redundancy and formalize SOP-006. Lean Memory Protocol is stable. Executing recommended pivot.

End-of-Day Distillation: Summarized all final exchanges for 2026-02-15. Confirmed removal of cron-sync-service and deletion of CRON_JOBS.md. Completed deep structural refactor of AGENTS.md (v1.2) to eliminate redundant legacy directives. Verified CLM monitoring and checkpointing protocol are fully stable across multiple pivots. Identity solidified as 'Natural Assistant' (objective/direct pushback).

End-of-Day Distillation: Logged minimal activity for 2026-02-17. Verified system was idle with no status changes in Mission Control. Confirmed database integrity and lack of active background operations.
Final EOD distillation for Friday, February 20th. Today consisted primarily of routine background health checks and state maintenance.
tasks: No major tasks advanced beyond maintenance.
